entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GCStress 0xF non-deterministically hangs managed app execution on Unix #68060
  • Generating `ref` files automatically after making changes in source files #68057
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.ActivityLink/ActivityEvent: Enumeration API #68056
    Future
  • Incorrect documentation for JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull #68052
  • JIT: Wrong result computed with forward sub enabled on x64 Windows/Linux #68049
  • NullableContextAttribute not applied to class with multiple methods containing same argument type #68047
  • clr.alljits subset fails cross-compiling for linux-x86 on linux-x64 #68044
  • `double` representation of `decimal.MaxValue` cannot be converted properly to `decimal` #68042
  • Run a .NET framework dll from .NET Core #68041
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests test library crashing in CI with dump available #68037
  • When stopping an IHost instance, IHostedService instances StopAsync method is called sequentially instead of asynchronously #68036
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessModuleTests.ModulesAreDisposedWhenProcessIsDisposed test is failing #68035
  • [Mono] TypeLoadException for class with variant interfaces #68033
  • [Mono] test failure: SIGABRT in nativeruntimeeventsource.cs #68032
  • Debug.Assert failure in System.Reflection.FieldInfo.SetValue in Debug Mono builds #68029
    7.0.0
  • Review the multi-op instruction usage for Arm64 #68028
  • Why does Reflection lie? #68026
  • Bogus null checks in MeterListener.SetMeasurementEventCallback<T> #68025
    7.0.0
  • Error in load assembly 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe, Version=4.0.4.1' #68023
  • [API Proposal]: Support uint for System.Diagnostics.Metrics instruments #68021
  • Application crash while stepping into if 'justMyCode' is disabled #68018
    7.0.0
  • APIs for exporting CertificateRequest and SignedCms to PEM #68017
  • .net core 3.1 remote debugging from VS 2019 to Raspberry PI - can't open existing file #68013
    7.0.0
  • Old TODO in `AppDomain::AddFileToCache`, verify and remove #68005
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\OSR\\largefuncletframe\\largefuncletframe.cmd #68003
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add managed API surface area for ByRefLike Generic constraints #68002
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Wasm: FS is not defined on .NET 7 #67290
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws times out #68034
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe always needs to rebuild in VS #45445
    7.0.0
  • Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #23799
    7.0.0
  • JsonNode.ToJsonString(JsonSerializerOptions options) Throw OutOfMemoryException #67943
    Future
  • OpenSSL error with Ubuntu 22.04 on Arm32 architecture #66310
    7.0.0
  • Timeouts in `System.Text.Json.Tests` on arm32 #67878
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #27324
    Future
  • Process.WaitForExit - COMException: The handle is invalid. #67231
  • Making numerical formatting specifiers more consistent #67623
    7.0.0
  • [Android] System.Text.Json MissingMethodException #67782
  • Regressions in SequenceEqual #67596
    7.0.0
  • Regex.Replace("X", ".*", "x$0y") = "xXyxy" wrong #68012
  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests crashing on MacCatalyst #65601
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure in System.IO.Tests.FileSystemWatcherTest.VerifyExpectedPaths brings down tests #67071
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #66167
    7.0.0
  • Pipelines API: Reading incoming bytes #64145

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy AOT PDBs to a subdirectory #68063
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce r2r-extra GC stress level to 0xC per #68060 #68062
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix MissingMethodException on calling methods with pointer arrays on generic classes #68059
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Handle static virtual methods correctly during IMT table const… #68058
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • vm: Improve getStringLiteral for dynamic context #68055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix tests broken on 'main' #68054
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #68051
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/6.0] JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #68050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix assert seen in some OSR cases #68048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix linux-x86 compilation for clr.alljits subset #68046
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use and support OpenSSL 3 on macOS #68045
    area-Infrastructure
  • Adding generic-math tests for decimal and double/single/half to parity the integer tests #68043
    area-System.Runtime
  • disable NTLM tests on systems with OpenSSL 3 #68039
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • NativeAOT build support and doc improvements #68038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update Microsoft.DotNet.Helix.Sdk #68024
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable exception for uint type. #68022
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [Android] Enable System.Net.Security tests #68020
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix documentation issues in recent DateTime API additions #68019
    area-System.Runtime
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove platform dependent compilation of System.Private.Uri #68011
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • re-enable TLS 13 tests on Windows #68009
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix PGO trace data collection in the presence of collectible assemblies #68001
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, PGO

Merged

  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • remove extra Console.WriteLine from test #68040
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Fix issues with JitDumpFg #68006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Report SIP survivors #67940
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix slow JSON assert #68027
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Use new `TimeSpan.TotalMicroseconds` API in `Socket.ToTimeoutMicroseconds` #68030
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Signal event occured based on expected paths, instead of throw #68010
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix bug where a gc struct is not zero initialized #67825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pass the argument to formatting function #67996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix issues with JitDump arguments #68007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make loop consistent and avoid CodeQL warning #68016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable System.IO.FileSystemWatcher and System.IO.Pipes.AccessControl tests on Mono on Windows #68015
    area-System.IO
  • Permit 'R'/'r' format specifier with integer formatting #67959
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Skip RegexNodeKind.UpdateBumpalong nodes when describing patterns #67992
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Revert Vector.Equals optimization #67202 #67902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Refactor code to make it easier to support LLVM 13.x in … #67692
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve retry handling for XHarness mono runtime tests #67955
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Check if pointer is null to prevent AV #67963
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the logic for regions detection #67979
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up write barrier macros #67790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #67924
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Revert "Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04" #67994
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • Block the test Runtime_56953 on Windows Arm32 with #67870 #67978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Various refactorings to share more code with future generators #67997
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable System.Text.Json tests on netfx (#63803) #67007
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Move Regex pattern description into partial method remarks #67990
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.6
  • [mono] Cleanup assembly loading #67984
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Fix the logic for regions detection #67995
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • hostpolicy: As a fallback, try to resolve mangled stdcall symbols on win-x86. #67813
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Expose the GetShortestBitLength, GetByteCount, and WriteLittleEndian APIs #67939
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: fix conv.ovf.i when source is long #1886

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet <command> -help or /help shows msbuild help #24868
    7.0.1xx
  • With 6.0.300-preview.22204.3, warning NU5104 occurs when packing a F# project #24864
  • Using Central Package Management with SDK 6.0.4 #24861

Closed

  • Running `dotnet test` on a project that uses optional workloads can't find them #21845

PullRequests

Created

  • Support multiple runtime packs per FrameworkReference #24873
  • Update specific package versions #24871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24863
    Area-Compatibility
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24860
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24862
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926

  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flow capture reference with id that was never captured #60757
  • Generic completions should add `<>` and put cursor between them #60751
  • KeyNotFoundException in remote process #60750
  • [LSP] Filtering completion items for methods also filters delegates #60755
  • Utf8String doesn't work with pattern matching #60747
  • Cross compilation for `arm64` on `x64` with a source generator in a solution fails #60744
  • Friendlier error message on an explicit implementation when the return type is wrong #60742
    Backlog
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" codefix can delete code comments #60741
  • Invalid attribute location warning suppresses errors #60739
    Compiler.Next
  • [LSP] Workspace diagnostics can become stale and never update #60738

Closed

  • Typing in Razor files breaks C# incrementality resulting in high CPU & memory usage #59818
    17.2
  • Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #55183
    17.2
  • Generate not available for identifier called "property" #27646
    Backlog
  • Completion list for explicit interface implementation doesn't include `checked` keyword for checked user-defined operators #60215
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to features/required members #60760
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable handling Modified -> Removed transitions in generator step tracking #60759
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Reenable concurrent OOP sync sharing. #60758
    Area-IDE
  • Suggestion after comparison operators in is pattern matching #60752
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Reorder synchronization code for clarity #60749
    Area-IDE
  • Add three new options for collapsing/outlining on file open #60743
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #60736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove duplicated asset #60754
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not try to refcount solution syncing when communicating with OOP #60753
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Add integration test to flag MEF composition breaks #60496
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Clean up IDiagnosticService extension methods #60723
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'main' into UnsignedRightShift #60748
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Allow generating variable with contextual keyword name in return statements #60684
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Delay symbol-search index updating until solution is fully loaded. #60746
    Area-IDE, Next
  • add more miscellaneous tests for checked operators #60727
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support checked operators in explicit interface implementation completion #60715
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE, auto-merge
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Breaking Change in .Net 6 - WebApplicationFactory Bug with MVC #41195
  • Home page of 6.0 is not displayed correctly after adding .AddRazorRuntimeCompilation() in Program.cs. #41193
  • LLVM Error When publishing blazor wasm #41192
  • Issue reading two querystrings from HttpContext.Request.Query #41191
  • Support for route handler filters in minimal APIs issue #41188
    7.0-preview4
  • Diagnosing production performance issues - missing PUT requests #41187

Closed

  • Allow knowing before render if `RenderFragment<T>` will return null or empty #41138
  • EditForm bindable validation state #41163
  • Blazor Forms #41184
  • Blazor cookie authentication OpenShift #41190
  • Headers are accepting non-ASCII characters after moving to .NET 6 #41186
  • SignalR: AllowAnonymous and Authorize don't play well together under Windows authentication #41139
  • Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource Blazor Wasm #38668
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Figure out unused CancellationToken in HubConnection.SendHubMessage #40475
    7.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41197
  • Bump async from 2.6.3 to 2.6.4 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #41196
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Try new docker image #41194
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Bump async from 3.2.1 to 3.2.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #41185
    area-signalr, javascript, 7.0-preview4
  • Skip failing template tests in more places #41178
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview4
  • [SignalR] Pass cancellation token to FlushAsync #41180
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Implement minimal RateLimitingMiddleware #41008
    area-runtime
  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Fix CompGov bugs #41179
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x
  • Add `AddStackExchangeRedisCache` & `AddHsts` overload #40689
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dumpasync should be able to filter stacks based on the bottom most frame #533
    .NET 7.0
  • Joining common stacks like parallel stacks #530
    .NET 7.0
  • Causality is lost when Task.Run is used #528
    .NET 7.0
  • Access violation during dotnet-dump analyze #2923

Updated

  • dotnet-counter console output corruption on resize #2934

PullRequests

Merged

  • Test symstore retry changes #2968
  • Rewrite DumpAsync in C# #2964
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Create clear error messages for dotnet-trace #3012
    dotnet-trace, .NET 7.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly in .NET 7 #6115
  • Counter is disappearing in the default MAUI project on Android #6112
  • Default MAUI project cannot be launched for Windows #6111
  • Blazor Hybrid Dev Tools Console Logging #6110
  • Setting HeightRequest/WidthRequest back to -1 currently doesn't reset WxH to unset #6107
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • .NET MAUI Blazor crashes when changing system font on Android device #6105
  • [WinUI] ContentView with a ControlTemplate is not displayed in Compatibility #6104
  • Application.Current.Windows maintains incorrect count #6103
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Change UseMauiEssentials to UsePlatformEssentials (or something similar) #6102
  • Picker doesn't show options in modal #6101
  • Changing Label Value at Runtime makes the label invisible #6100
  • Release event is fired twice when hit a button #6095
  • There's no way AFAIK of changing the color of the magnifying glass in SearchBar #6094
    6.0.300-servicing
  • RadioButton example from Xamarin Forms gallery converted to MAUI doesn't work on Android: radio buttons are not selectable #6093
  • The prompts displayed by DisplayAlert do not follow the theme set #6092

Closed

  • Debugging is harder than it need be #6034
  • Obsolete warnings on Device are no longer correct #6072
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RC1 Compilation failed to complete #6022
  • Using a StackLayout with AndExpand causes some sort of layout loop/invalidation/re-add #3519
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Edge Developer Tools not showing after upgrading to MAUI RC1 #6098
  • The image is not displayed on Android when image source is a web resource #6099
  • NRE with Essentials Preferences on Windows #5951
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on hybrid Android apps #5986
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [iOS] Port Editor.VerticalTextAlignment to Handler #391
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [WinUI] Crashing issue in ScrollView with orientation horizontal #4951
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions Expand not work in HorizontalStackLayout and VerticalStackLayout #6031
  • BlazorWebView API review: Shared sources #5905
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] [Android] [MAUI Blazor] Crash on Android 5 device/emulator #3023
    6.0.300
  • Release Candidate Fails #6074
  • On screen keyboard #5272
    6.0.300
  • Create ContentPage VS template not using proper namespace when adding new ContentPage inside a folder #6049
  • Maui Blazor App (new template) will not build for iOS after update to latest VS Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 #6017
  • ERROR ITMS-90165: Invalid Provisioning Profile Signature #6044
  • How do we console.log to the Browser developer tools for NET MAUI Blazor? #6090
  • Make IResourcesProvider public to be able to register this on the DI Container #6045
  • template for maui blazor preview #5543
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Problem with English spelling of GREY in .NET MAUI TableView #5677
  • Add Marker/Annotation clustering for the Maps package that .NET MAUI will have #5735
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Include margin in Frame's DesiredSize #6114
    area/layout 🔲
  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/shell 🐢
  • Views spanning both auto and star cells should not contribute to the Auto size #6106
    area/layout 🔲
  • Fix WinUI class libraries a bit better #6089
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, p/0, partner/winui, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • Use the correct text in the [Obsolete] attributes #6079
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Remove uses-sdk from the manifest #6113
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Static content hot reload (CSS only for now) #6097
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Add vertical text alignment to Editor #5996
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892

  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706

  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650

  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Table valued function with left joined table generates wrong nullable types #27823
  • How to define a view with linq query results? #27822
  • How do you configure a one-to-one/many relationship for future entities? #27821

Closed

  • How to avoid COALESCE in SUM operations #27825
  • Make Scaffold generate field as CLR Enum #27792

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27811
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Introduce UpdateQueryExpression on ShapedQueryExpression #27824

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27813
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error whilst uninstalling .NET 6 SDK - api-ms-win-core-path-l1-1-0.dll is missing #13527

PullRequests

Created

Merged
